children.value: <!-- <StatusBanner warning> Development Grants funding is currently closed </StatusBanner> -->
Apply for Funding - Help Grow MakerDAO

We provide grants for projects and events that help strengthen Maker, the community, and Dai's adoption. We offer grants ranging from 5K - 50K Dai and distribute blocks of funds as teams reach predetermined milestones.
<Box sx={{backgroundColor:'primaryMuted', borderRadius:'12px', padding:'12px', display:'flex', flexDirection:'column', flexWrap:'wrap'}}>
Develop infrastructure and applications for the Maker ecosystem.
Passionate about MakerDAO and DeFi? Planning a physical or virtual meetup? The microgrant program is for you!
Apply for funding from the community to help build MakerDAO.
We’ve Awarded Over 683,887 Dai to More Than 30 Projects
Started in February 2018, the MakerDAO Community Development Initiative funds teams creating infrastructure and applications within the Maker ecosystem.
